data.title: Past Studio Clients Include Air Supply, Dr. Dre, ESPN & More
data.meta_description: The Hideout Recording Studio Clients The Hideout Recording Studio is proud to have worked with a diverse list of clients, including music-recording artists, bands, orchestras, singers, songwriters, and voice over artists, as well as video, theater, film, and television productions. Here is a list of just a few of the clients who have worked under
data.text:
The Hideout Recording Studio is proud to have worked with a diverse list of clients, including music-recording artists, bands, orchestras, singers, songwriters, and voice over artists, as well as video, theater, film, and television productions. Here is a list of just a few of the clients who have worked under our roof.
